name: Flame Guardian
description:
Welcome to FLAME GUARDIAN! Your task in each level is to collect all of the flames and then return to your star, avoiding shadows all the way. You get more points for being quick and avoiding hits.

Controls:

Z to jump

Arrow keys to move/drift in space

X to pause

This game was made for the DREAM ARCADE ARCHIVE jam.

Background art and programming by Kate Swanson

Music and sound by D'Anthoni Wooten

Sprites and title screen by Ava Riemer
